attributes.action: Make it a safe place and help the struggling mental health students
attributes.background: Assist the schools with allowing special help to those suffering from mental health issues

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about help provided to students who are struggling with their mental health, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Provide funding for mental wellbeing staff for children in schools and college: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628202

Require all secondary schools and colleges to have a full-time counsellor: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630482

Make mental health an authorised reason to be absent from school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630995

If you want the Government to do something else you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
